name: Breakout! (UberhenriK)
description:
Play as a genetically-engineered monster created in a lab and fight to survive against waves of human enemies in this turn-based, card-based strategy game. Use a variety of movement and attack cards to outmaneuver and defeat your foes in a series of challenging events. Will you be able to survive and prove that you are the ultimate monster?

This is a game made in 5 days for Jame Gam 26. Unfortunately, I didn't have enough time to finish it because the idea was too ambitious from the start.
